website_summaries.verdict: Minimalist jewelry storage option that is discreet yet decorative.
pros: Stacking-bowl design with 5-inch diameter can accommodate rings, bracelets, earrings, and necklaces with ease
cons: Limited storage and organization for the price

customer_reviews.title: Darker than pictured
customer_reviews.text: The "concrete" compartments are darker than advertised. I expected it to be an actual lightly colored concrete shade, instead what I received looks like almost...wet concrete? The fact that it's so dark makes the plate/lid look very off and sort of ruins the whole look. That's the only reason I'm giving this 3 stars, because I didn't receive what I expected. Even the box it comes in has the compartments looking lighter than this. It's nice, though - heavy, the pieces stack well with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Light olive green, not grey
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more light olive green in color than a light grey concrete. Still very nice quality and feel, just a huge bummer about the color- as light grey looks much nicer with rose gold. Took a box/product comparison photo.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Large Modern Box.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I anticipated. The pictures online make the lid size look comparable to that of a hockey puck or Alexa. However, in person, the size is MUCH larger. More like a dessert plate. I read another review that said that size was larger before I purchased so I am not upset. More bang for my buck! But definitely keep this in mind if you are looking for a smaller jewelry box. I also like the felt on the inside of the box and the color of the lid is super pretty. Other than the size, the item is exactly as pictured. This box is also heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A SaramaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: beautiful jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I recently decided to re-do my makeup/jewelry shelf and came across this and the same design set jewelry stand. Got them in the mail separately both packaged well with lots of padding. These are so pretty. I love the rose gold color! the actual box is bigger than I expected (so you should really look at the dimensions) which is nice to fit more in, but harder to pick up the top lid or top cup with one hand. I'm also not sure if it's intentional but the bottom cup is slightly bigger than the top. The material looks and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty T

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this beautiful jewelry box & omg it is definitely worth the money. It is bigger & heavier than I anticipated even though I should’ve known from the description that it is marble.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Nieves Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but color can vary
customer_reviews.text: So I actually ordered this twice because it is very beautiful. The first one I got was a pretty cement, gray color but my dumb dumb ex used the top of it as a water coaster -_- so it ruined the top with big ol' discolored rim. So I did order another one--this other one came and the copper color was the same but not concrete holder part was more of a greige color which I was disappointed with. But since I only bought the second one for the new lid I just switched that out and use the other one in a closet for random buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. There were a lot of reviews complaining about the color. Is looks exactly like the photo. It does have a slight greenish tint just like the photo. Its quality. Seems a bit pricy but it was exactly what I was looking for so it was worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Eichelkraut

customer_reviews.title: cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I wouldn't like the color since other reviewers said the color was "off" but the one I received looked just like the image. It's a great design and fits a lot more than I expected. That being said, I also have the glass version of this and like that much better.
customer_reviews.author: sof

customer_reviews.title: perfectly great
customer_reviews.text: Great weight, great bottom cushions to stay on counter, great color, and great inconspicuous storage. I keep my large earrings at the bottom, small earrings in the middle, and jewelry i wear often at the top. looks perfect in my grey marble bathroom and simply protects whats inside. Saw it someplace else for more money & of course Amazon had it cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect, but no regrets
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concrete jewellery holder, and love how it comes apart into two pieces as needed. The cover is very solid and has some weight to it, which is what I was looking for. I didn't give 5 stars because the color in person isn't exactly as pictured, which after reading other reviews I expected would happen. The cover is more copper than rose gold in appearance, and the concrete body is a dark grey (picture wet concrete) instead of the light brushed concrete look. Still, very happy with purchase. The jewellery box is bigger than what I had thought it would be, and I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very cute small jewelry container!
customer_reviews.text: First off this was packaged very well! Every piece was bubble wrapped and surrounded by foam. It’s the perfect size if your jewelry collection is on the small side, see my hand for size comparison. The bottom of each individual piece is covered by a soft velvety material so as not to scratch your surfaces. It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional jewelry holder!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jewelry holder. Looks more expensive than it is, it is heavy and sturdy. Very pretty gray marble and I love how it stacks with 2 places for jewelry and then the top lid is also made for jewelry. I put my everyday jewelry on the lid and the rest in the other compartments. Overall, very impressed and pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn West

customer_reviews.title: Functional Jewelry/Trinket Tray
customer_reviews.text: Stackable jewelry box/tray is sturdy, has earthy tones in it and is lined with a short pile of velvet. Love the contrast between the body and lid. It’s just a tad heavy but I don’t mind the weight because it will last a lifetime, and this is durable. I store my crystals with this and leave pieces on the lid for display and allow the crystals to work its energies.
customer_reviews.author: JenInLA

customer_reviews.title: Could've Been Perfect but Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Could've been cool but arrived cracked and scuffed in a perfectly fine shipping box but umbra's box (which the item came in) had obviously been opened before too... Just feels like I got a used item. If it wasn't a gift that I needed to give tomorrow, I'd return it so i could get a better one. Just hoping recipient doesn't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted the white marble with a rose gold top lol but this was a fantastic substitute! I love how heavy it is, it feels good quality. It’s the perfect size not too big but not too small either. The white marble is exactly as pictured and the silver top isn’t too shiny, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality arrived as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jewelry holder. After reading other reviews I was nervouse the time wouldnt arrive as pictures but it came juat the same. A little smaller than I expected but great quality and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Journi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Non-traditional & awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. I was looking for a jewelry box that wasn't overly "girly" or traditional. This fits the bill! The pieces just stack on top of each other, so there's nothing securing them together except gravity. But this jewelry box is awesome! My husband has a copper Umbra giraffe ring holder to match, and it sits right on top. It's like a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: emjay

customer_reviews.title: Great design + function
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant, clean-looking jewelry box. There are two compartments and the top serves as an open storage surface. The compartments are relatively generous in size, are lined with felt, and aren’t sub-divided. The capacity is limited, so I see this as being more for everyday use accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Distant Planet

customer_reviews.title: This jewelry organizer is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry organizer is perfect! I needed something to keep my studs, hoops, and other pieces in that I could not hang up. It’s very fashionable and would make a great gift. It’s thick glass and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter-in-law for Mother’s Day. I was so impressed with the quality and beauty of it! The color wasn’t absolutely identical to the picture, but it was close. It was still stunning! I hope they create some new items just like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Concept for jewelry box.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful... the color and concept of two compartments is ahhhmayzingggg!!! My only draw back, it would be perfect if the ceramic compartments would line up when stacked. Otherwise, I love my jewelry tower!
customer_reviews.author: Laritza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ring Storage
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my rings more accessible than if they were tucked away in my large jewelry box. The rings I wear every day are placed on the copper lid each night (which has stopped my oh-so-helpful cats from knocking them off the dresser as they used to). The trays store my other rings easily, providing quick access and good visibility when I want to wear one. The box as a whole is very sturdy and elegant. Love this jewelry box!
customer_reviews.author: Megs13

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to store my Alex and Ani bangles and this does the trick plus adds a nice piece to my bedroom. Love the rose gold tune and the ceramic storage. It's very pretty and I highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Y

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love Great for storing Apple Watch and watch bands. I love the copper look and the concrete has a smooth texture.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little jewelry holder. I love that it has 2 sections plus a little tray on top for frequently used items. Sturdy, well made, good sized. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Good for hiding everyday jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the counter and hides my everyday jewelry so it doesn’t look cluttered. Only minor complaint is that both layers are a really loose fit so they don’t stack perfectly. Otherwise, it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: A lot of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I put everything from earrings, apple watch bands, and rings in this! It has a lot more storage than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Sarver

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with the set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one at full price, and the matching necklace tree for $20 as a return from the Amazon warehouse. I'm really happy with the set. The copper is very pinky, not orange, so that might put some people off. But I like it and it's sturdy and sleek. Looks very nice on the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: HowAboutNope

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the overall quality
customer_reviews.text: The two containers are not symmetrical with each other and have some very noticeable warping. When stacked, the parting line between the two pieces does not match or line up. Disappointed with the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's a good size (a little bigger than i expected), and I love the stackable design. Right now we have him stacked all up as pictured, but we may unstack and use part as more of a "catch all." The colors really go well with our bedroom too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as pictures
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this jar but it isn’t as pictured. The concrete is more of a green color which I’m not impressed with but my wife is happy so what can I say. The picture I attached doesn’t really show the green tint that well but like I said, happy wife.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than you'd imagine/expect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE, I was expecting something to hold a few rings and earrings, not full sized lipsticks, my keys, gift cards, and whatever else, definitely worth it, and the price is worth it too, looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. Bigger than i thought but thats probably my fault because i didnt measure it. It fits the jewelry that i wear everyday and it looks elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: Great compact storage
customer_reviews.text: Great compact storage for small jewelry. The item was very well packaged with lots of styrofoam and bubble wrap. If the color of the concrete was accurate, I would have given this product 5 stars. It's more of a greenish concrete color. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: CraftyQiao

customer_reviews.title: Well made for a man's jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: ....I love the Umbra Tesora Jewelry Organizer. It's heavy and well made for a men's jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Color off
customer_reviews.text: Qquality nicely made. However The color is more a gray green olive drab then gray cement color which is what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It is darker in person, but loved it anyway. The concrete and rose gold are both darker in person, so it's more like dark concrete and copper. However, it well made, has velvet on the bottoms of the bowls and on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Breakfastinrome

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and worth  the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased the look and functionality of this jewelry holder.
customer_reviews.author: NayaP

customer_reviews.title: Win everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: My god what an upgrade from what I had. This is so beautiful and stylish! I really love I can put my earrings in the top and my bracelets in the bottom. Definitely a huge win!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely beautiful. It holds my most-worn jewelry well and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. It holds my most-worn jewelry well and is so lovely. It's very modern. Is has been in my bedroom and kitchen and has withstood both environments.
customer_reviews.author: Sean&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would either be too big or too small. This actually was the perfect weight and size. It came in the exact color as pictured. Will be using this for my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This box is green
customer_reviews.text: Short story: much like other user pictures show, this box is green. Not grey. I didn't like the look of it so I returned it. Otherwise the design is adorable but the color is not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Frazoo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected, but that’s totally fine because my husband love it for our wedding rings and watch.
customer_reviews.author: Invisible Mother

customer_reviews.title: perfect for master bath counter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my guy to keep a few regularly worn jewelry items safe on our bathroom counter. Looks great. And the man likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: volitant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love my jewelry box. I looks great on my bathroom counter. And if I want to put one in the other bathroom I can for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a jewelry organizer for a while, but I do not like the look of common jewelry display organizers. This product is amazing! Super high quality and looks beautiful sitting out! I am surprised by how many items it holds!
customer_reviews.author: great

customer_reviews.title: Lovely jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: this is really beautiful! high quality item! it is sleek, with soft velvet on the inside bottom of each section for jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Sybilsadie

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this adorable box
customer_reviews.text: My sister received this as a birthday present and she loved the size and quality of the box, but it must be mentioned she has very little jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Linnette Arguello

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match images provided
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute product, unfortunately the color is nothing like the natural concrete color represented in the images. The actual body of the containers is a soft pea or moss green. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Snarlalv

customer_reviews.title: Love the white and gold.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It looks great in the bathroom. Wanted something smaller for my everyday jewelry and stud earrings.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Color not as advertised.  Only buy “concrete” if you want GREEN
customer_reviews.text: This is green not concrete. Last time I checked, sidewalks were gray.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trinket keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trinket keeper. I use it on my coffee table for jewelry and hair bands as my cats like to find and play with those items. Very stylish and heavy so it isn’t knocked around, looks great in the marble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product is beautiful. it is much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: this product is beautiful. it is much bigger than I expected. it is heavy like concrete and very sturdy. I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected and quite heavy as a result
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Timeless & Perfect for Minimalists
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It's beautiful and perfect for the minimalist.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: bangles and earrings nicely. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected this will fit all my rings, bangles and earrings nicely. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. The jewelry box looks fantastic and beautiful! And it is very well made, functional. Just perfect with all my earrings and rings. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly, Good quality and nice colors. Very modern vibe to it. I would’ve liked more if it’s smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Arij

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty- smaller than I expected (but that's not a bad thing). The only thing I didn't like is that each compartment is not very deep, so I have one cuff bracelet that can't fit inside or it causes the lid to not close
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Keeps frequently used pieces at hand.
customer_reviews.text: I like this Jewelry box! I have two. While I have a jewelry cabinet I use these to put my regularly used pieces.
customer_reviews.author: james groebe

customer_reviews.title: I love this little jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I love this little jewelry box. The color is a tad bit darker than it looks in the pictures, but that does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Simple - but wonderful jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Simple but wonderful jewelry box - nice capacity, the top is nice tray space too. Good heft, beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Amberg

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worth the price; would use personally, but also as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this just thought it was going to be a bit smaller
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. It’s durable and I use it nightly. The jewelry I wear most often stays on my bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Practical and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from the Outlet and mine came 100 percent perfect!
customer_reviews.author: seymour5000

customer_reviews.title: Not the average jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty, simple, and heavy-duty jewelry box. The mixed materials make it interesting, and it stands apart from wooden boxes which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected, color and size. It’s thick and heavy, very well made. And I like how you can place your jewelry on the top lid. I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute color and big storage space!
customer_reviews.text: It looks so cute in my bathroom! It’s the perfect size and holds a lot more than I expected. The color is exactly as expected and the velvet lining is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: CUTEST
customer_reviews.text: I hate clutter so this is the perfect size and great quality for a jewelry box. Also is nice style so its hidden and appears as dainty decor instead. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Use it to hold my jewelry on my boat. Love this product and use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Bock

customer_reviews.title: Very chic
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry organizer. It’s beautiful and the glass is much thicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Battle

customer_reviews.title: Charming
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little jewelry box that doesn’t look like a jewelry box. It’s a cute accent piece on my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica LeGrant

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and nice looking, clean, clear, useful, great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sonam Gamtso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jewelry box, goes perfectly on my dresser and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nanor Bozoyan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The copper cover has black spots on it and the cement holders are a very dark ugly gray—not like the soft gray pictured.
customer_reviews.author: cecily

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than i expected, but it is beautiful and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Gift they Lady to whom it was gifted to loved it.
customer_reviews.author: J. O. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the size
customer_reviews.text: Great piece and looks great on marble countertops. Big enough to fit a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Gato! I absolutely love this jewelry stand and box! Color is lovely, the material is concrete and durable, and the aesthetics couldn't feel better! I would highly recommend these two products!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Super classy way to store your jewelry! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in color
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality of this piece, but mine is an olive green color. Not at all what is pictured on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: so sad and so bad
customer_reviews.text: The express was lost at the gate and was very sad
customer_reviews.author: C12345

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color. The cement is more of a dark green gray and looks horrible with the copper top
customer_reviews.author: kristin bryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you like pretty things
customer_reviews.text: Every one I know who sees it likes it and asks me about it. It’s gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: ... read how big it actually was but this is like 5 times the size I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Okay its my fault because I didnt read how big it actually was but this is like 5 times the size I thought it would be. Its huge! Way too big for my dresser, pretty but way too big.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought this was smaller. Its rather lovely nonetheless, but it is a bit bigger than i would like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Thayssa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match the jewelry necklace stand and they look so lovely!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Cute jewelry box. I liked it a lot, but it wasn't quite big enough so I ordered a second to stack on top of the first.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was more of a green color rather than tan
customer_reviews.author: spencer davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly the way it is picture. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece, but just the color doesnt fully match with the pic
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal Bertoglio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like the photo. Much darker and not very nice in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: rust

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: maybe for those in their 20s, who could be able to make this work. for those of us 30+ this looks too cheap to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: flotsam

customer_reviews.title: Size is great, bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my GF, she loves it. The design is fun--the utilitarian concrete against the copper lid. Size is great, bigger than I expected, but not too large. Looks very nice sitting on our dresser.
customer_reviews.author: dmbPhotog

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made, shiny, a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy! Its almost like crystal its so heavy. The texture is nicely done, the finish on the tray is very shiny and doesn't seem like it will scratch too easily. I've wiped it down with isopropyl and that didn't tarnish the finish so that's great. Its wide enough to hold ear swabs. The bowls fit well so they don't wobble, won't knock off easily. Very nicely done. Well padded for shipping. Probably could have paid less if I could find in a store, but I'm glad I could find it at all.
customer_reviews.author: formeandmykidsdogsandhogs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for to finish off my nightstand. It holds any stray jewelry that I take off at night before I get to put it away. And I can keep some hairties and bobby pins on the table, too.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Way to Store Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected, but still beautiful! I love that the bowls stack cleanly, and the whole piece is great for displaying right on my dresser instead of stuffing my jewelry in my drawers like I did before. Also, the lid is sloped on the edges a little, so if necessary you can place some items on top. I found one bowl big enough to hold a few bracelets and some earrings in one layer, but the individual bowls are deep enough to keep many more items. Oh, and the bottoms of the bowls are velvety, so the jewelry won't slide around when you move it around on your dresser.
customer_reviews.author: M Kim

customer_reviews.title: I recently bought one for my mom for Mothers day and its beautiful. There is a felt liner in each of ...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this. I recently bought one for my mom for Mothers day and its beautiful. There is a felt liner in each of the compartments as to not scratch the jewelry. The material is not actual concrete... it seems to be a stone resin of some sort? like a cesarstone maybe? softer and lighter to the touch of concrete. I have one on my wish list now too.. I might purchase two, as they could stack
customer_reviews.author: Samsies

customer_reviews.title: Unique-Functional-Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. It is convenient to use and I can keep my frequently worn jewelry downstairs in the sitting room. As far as appearance goes the product is much darker than the picture on this website. It looks like wet concrete but surprisingly it works because of the copper toned cover. The cover is heavy so it anchors the whole thing and makes a nice tray to hold pieces of jewelry. So this product is a win. It's unique.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H

product_meta.title: Umbra Tesora Jewelry Box, Two-Tier Resin Storage Container with Removable Lid, Concrete/Copper
product_meta.description:
Color:Concrete/Copper

Finding the ideal storage solution that not only organizes but protects your jewelry from being lost or scratched, while keeping it easily accessible, can be a challenge – but not anymore! 

Introducing Tesora Jewelry Box and Jewelry Holder by Umbra

Tesora keeps your favorite jewelry and accessories easily accessible with an elegant two-tiered, stacking design. The plated metal lid can be used as a jewelry tray while the two storage compartments stack to create a unique container that’s ideal for organizing rings, broaches, necklaces, and more.

Each of the stackable compartments feature a padded base and soft linin lining that protects your jewelry, and your counter or table top, from unwanted scratches.

Give your favorite jewelry and accessories a safe home by ordering the Tesora Jewelry Box, Jewelry Organizer today.

About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, and functional design for the home.
